ItemTooltips.blink: Allows you to initiate very well.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Get this if the enemy team casts a lot of spells.
ItemTooltips.flask: Restores HP when you are low.
ItemTooltips.tango: Use this to regen up when you are harassed.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Gives good damage and lets you chase better.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Buy this if the team needs the aura.
ItemTooltips.pipe: A good item to buy if no one else on the team does.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Makes you Primal Split much better, also gives you good stats.
ItemTooltips.assault: A good aura and gives good armor.
ItemTooltips.heart: Gives tons of HP and damage.
ItemTooltips.vanguard: Get this if you want more HP and regen and you need damage block.
ItemTooltips.sange_and_yasha: Get this if you want more DPS.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Gives good stats and has a nice aura.

AbilityTooltips.brewmaster_thunder_clap: Good damage and slow. Try to hit a lot of enemies with this.
AbilityTooltips.brewmaster_drunken_haze: Makes enemies walk very slow and miss attacks.
AbilityTooltips.brewmaster_drunken_brawler: Allows you to tank more and deal more damage.
AbilityTooltips.brewmaster_primal_split: Very good ability, use it early to get kills an later in team fights to initiate and wreak havoc. Remember to use each spirits abilities.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Take these once you have to.
